What is the relationship between state population and the average county economic connectedness in a state?

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
#| label: set up

library(tidyverse)

x <- read_rds("data/ec.rds")
```



```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: plotting
x |> 
  mutate(state = str_replace(county_name, ".*, ", "")) |> 
  slice_sample(n = 10)

```
